_metadata.description: Manual validation tracking for requirements that cannot be automated

validations.title: Template marketplace integration
validations.validation_notes: Requires business decision on trust/safety model before implementation. Need to define: template submission process, review criteria, security scanning requirements, and marketplace UI/UX.
next_steps: Define trust/safety model for third-party templates
Design template submission and review workflow
Implement security scanning for uploaded templates
Create marketplace UI for template discovery

validations.title: Template migration helper
validations.validation_notes: Requires versioning strategy and migration patterns before implementation. Need to define: version comparison logic, migration script generation, compatibility checks, and automated testing of migrations.
next_steps: Implement version comparison and compatibility checking

validations.title: Analytics on generation usage
validations.validation_notes: Requires analytics infrastructure and metrics definition before implementation. Need to define: which events to track, data retention policy, privacy considerations, and analytics dashboard.
next_steps: Define key metrics to track (generations per template, success rate, customization patterns)
Implement event telemetry in generation pipeline
Create analytics dashboard in factory UI
Define data retention and privacy policy
